cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.12)
project(ezxml)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)
MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD='${CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD}'")
MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS='${CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS}'")
MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS='${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}'")
MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER='${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER}'")
MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_LINK_LIBRARIES='${CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_LINK_LIBRARIES}'")


file(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_PRIVATE ./src/*.c* ./src/*.h*)
file(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_PUBLIC ./include/ezxml/*.h)

add_library(ezxml STATIC ${SRC_PRIVATE} ${SRC_PUBLIC})
source_group( "private" FILES ${SRC_PRIVATE} )
source_group( "public" FILES ${SRC_PUBLIC} )

target_include_directories(ezxml PUBLIC include)
target_include_directories(ezxml PRIVATE .)

MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD='${CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD}'")
MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS='${CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS}'")
MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS='${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}'")
MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER='${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER}'")
MESSAGE(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_LINE}: CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_LINK_LIBRARIES='${CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_LINK_LIBRARIES}'")
